typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		date as string,
		actual_mean_temp as double,
		actual_min_temp as double,
		actual_max_temp as double,
		average_min_temp as double,
		average_max_temp as double,
		record_min_temp as string,
		record_max_temp as string,
		record_min_temp_year as string,
		record_max_temp_year as string,
		actual_precipitation as string,
		average_precipitation as string,
		record_precipitation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(actual_mean_temp_c = multiply(actual_mean_temp - 32, 10/18),
		actual_min_temp_c = (actual_min_temp - 32)/1.8,
		hot_cold = iif((actual_max_temp-32)/1.8 > 20, 'Hot', 'Cold')) ~> actualMeanTempC
actualMeanTempC sink(input(
		date as string,
		actual_mean_temp as string,
		actual_min_temp as string,
		actual_max_temp as string,
		average_min_temp as string,
		average_max_temp as string,
		record_min_temp as string,
		record_max_temp as string,
		record_min_temp_year as string,
		record_max_temp_year as string,
		actual_precipitation as string,
		average_precipitation as string,
		record_precipitation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> output
